Just stop for a second and look around: we have technology that is capable of things that we cannot possibly imagine, yet we struggle to create a website that doesnâ€™t lag on the newest MacBook Pro or create an android app that wonâ€™t crash every now and then on an 8 gig snapdragon 845 smartphone.

item.title: About me
